import React,{useContext} from 'react' import PageTitle from '../../components/layout/PageTitle' import DataContext from '../../Data/DataContext' import SectionTitle from '../../components/layout/SectionTitle' const UseContext = (props) => { const [state,setState] = useContext(DataContext) function addNumber(n){ setState({ ...state, number: state.number + n }) } return (
{state.text} {state.number}
) } export default UseContext
